description: Try our easy to follow Avocado, Basil & Pine Nut Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Avocado, Basil & Pine Nut Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 red capsicum, seeded and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Toast 30g pine nuts in a dry frying pan for several minutes. Mix together with 1 ripe diced avocado,2 tbsp mayonnaise, salt and black pepper, pinch of cayenne, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp finely grated Parmesan, and finely chopped spring onions. Warm through 3 tortillas. Spread over the avocado mixture, scatter with basil leaves and 1/2 seeded and thinly sliced red capsicums, and roll up tightly in cling film. Cover and refrigerate until needed. Slice on an angle to serve.
